content: On the night of August 19, the topic "Taiwanese Angelica" topped the Weibo hot search list. The People's Daily said in a picture: "Taiwan independence" is a historical countercurrent and a dead end. The motherland must be unified and will inevitably be unified.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
At about 11:42 on August 20, an intercity bus from Lai'an County, Anhui Province to Linchang Station suddenly caught fire while driving on the Nanjing Huaqiying section of National Highway 104.
At about 12:00, the open fire was extinguished.
After preliminary investigation, the cause of the fire was the spontaneous combustion of a lithium battery carried by a passenger. The fire caused the death of two passengers and partial burns to five others. They have been sent to the hospital for treatment and are not in danger of life. The relevant circumstances of the accident are under further investigation.
